description.value: The Clans represent a coalition of groups who follow the Council of Truth in its aim in opposing Omni-Tek's dominance and bringing about a free Rubi-Ka. They are diverse in their ideologies, ranging from commercial enterprises and ecological activism to militant resistance and chivalrous orders.

life_path.name: Vanguard Mercantile
life_path.description: As a Vanguard, you are part of a Clan-based commercial enterprise, skilled in trade and negotiation, striving to ensure economic independence from Omni-Tek.
life_path.equipment: Business attire, portable trading device, secure credit account, trade contracts.

life_path.name: Unionist
life_path.description: Committed to advocating for the rights and welfare of workers, you are actively involved in organizing and protecting the interests of laborers across Rubi-Ka.
life_path.equipment: Work gear, union banners and pamphlets, communication device, documentation tools.

life_path.name: Sentinel Extremist
life_path.description: As a member of the Sentinels, you adopt an uncompromising stance against Omni-Tek, engaging in aggressive actions and guerrilla tactics to disrupt corporate operations.
life_path.equipment: Guerrilla warfare gear, explosives, encrypted communication device, survival kit.

life_path.name: Terra Firma Activist
life_path.description: Passionately dedicated to protecting Rubi-Ka's environment, you engage in various ecological initiatives, advocating against environmental exploitation.
life_path.equipment: Environmental monitoring gear, eco-awareness materials, non-violent protest tools, biodegradable supplies.

life_path.name: New Dawn Advocate
life_path.description: As a proponent of peaceful coexistence, you work towards diplomatic solutions, promoting dialogue and understanding between conflicting parties.
life_path.equipment: Peace envoy attire, diplomatic credentials, negotiation aids, symbol of New Dawn.

life_path.name: Knight of Avalon
life_path.description: Aligned with the Shadowlands Redeemed, you fight for higher ideals, standing against the Unredeemed and Omni-Tek, upholding the noble values of honor and justice.
life_path.equipment: Avalon knight armor, ceremonial sword, shield with the Avalon crest, code of conduct scroll.
